name: Abstract Visions
artistStatement: An exploration of abstract forms in nature...

artworks.title: Sunset Over Waves
artworks.description: A vibrant representation of a sunset over the ocean.
artworks.altText: An orange and red sunset over waves crashing on a shore.
artworks.artsyAltText: A dramatic and fiery expression of the sun’s final moments over the ocean’s tumultuous waves.

artworks.title: Ocean Sounds
artworks.description: The calming sound of waves crashing on the shore.
artworks.artsyAltText: A soft, immersive blend of water caressing the sand, a lullaby from the ocean.

artworks.title: Wave Motion
artworks.description: Slow-motion video of waves crashing on rocks.
artworks.altText: A video showing waves crashing on rocks in slow motion.
artworks.artsyAltText: A surreal, fluid dance of water embracing stone, frozen in time.
